body_html:
I installed tensorflow from source. I am using the master branch of tensorflow .
The output to commit hash is:
270cf03

It'd be great if you knew of a way to use local copy of grpc and other repos. It takes too much time for every time I try to install the lib again.

body:
I installed tensorflow from source. I am using the master branch of tensorflow .
The output to commit hash is:
270cf03d58922f728b0d14636e0afc28d192b6fd

It'd be great if you knew of a way to use local copy of grpc and other repos. It takes too much time for every time I try to install the lib again.
